flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 800 because 8 x 100 = <<800=800>>800
The third guessed 600 because 800 - 200 = <<800-200=600>>600
The total guesses of the first three is 5100 because 100 + 800 + 600 = <<100+800+600=5100>>5100
The average of the first three guesses is 1700 because 5100 / 3 = <<5100/3=1700>>1700
The fourth student guessed 1725 because 1700 + 25 = <<1700+25=1725>>1725
#### 1725

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 5100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
